turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location you would like it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh the one located on 55 River Oaks Place. It is the closest from us.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, no problem. Let me write down what you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want Java Chip Frappuccino Blended Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like some whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have some snack there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh yes, they do. Please check the menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's a good idea. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about Cheese & Fruit Protein box?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all. Thanks.
